data.name: Blue Bridge Light
data.author: TheNob
data.description: Changes the bridge lighting to a tactical-blue illumination. The alarm light got a little boost too. Swaps the Hangar-CCTV for a Vehicle Loadout Screen which fits perfectly to the Vehicle Control Stations below. Integrates also the "4th Drone Control Station" by Teledahn which would otherwise be incompatible and which was the inspiration for my own screen modification.
